entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Friday 28 April 2023
